scripts.build: npm run build-lib ; npm run build-dist
scripts.watch: npm run watch-lib & npm run watch-dist
scripts.build-dist: browserify --debug  --standalone zxcvbn -t coffeeify --extension='.coffee' -t uglifyify src/main.coffee |   exorcist --base . dist/zxcvbn.js.map >| dist/zxcvbn.js
scripts.watch-dist: watchify --debug -v --standalone zxcvbn -t coffeeify --extension='.coffee' -t uglifyify src/main.coffee -o 'exorcist --base . dist/zxcvbn.js.map >| dist/zxcvbn.js'
